pullRequest.title: dotCMS/core#17795 List and Card View for Content Search and Site Browser

commit.message: Add card view, render results, paginate and search
Merge branch 'issue-17795' of https://github.com/dotCMS/core into issue-17795
Add list/card buttons and make the switch
Add selects events and keep selected on state
Merge branch 'issue-17795' of https://github.com/dotCMS/core into issue-17795
Fix to get inode from card view
Toggle display in card and list instead of readding all the data
Show hide view selector depends of results
Add new version of web components
#17795 fixing the has live version on the Contetlet Ajax
#17795 fixing Contetlet Ajax has a language as a string
